sentences.sContent: My daughter-in-law said that I was interfering, but I was only trying to help.
sentences.sCn: 我的儿媳说我多管闲事，但我只是想帮忙。

sentences.sContent: ...And most of us may sometimes feel the frustration of having old memories interfere with new...
...so long as Barack Obama and the Democrats in Congress resist the temptation to interfere too much...

phrases.pCn: 干扰，干涉；妨碍；触动或弄坏；乱动；与……抵触

remMethod.val: inter (在…之间) ＋ fer(带来) ＋ e → 来到中间 → 于涉

trans.tranOther: to deliberately get involved in a situation where you are not wanted or needed
